data.title: See My Setup
data.subTitle: With so many options, how do you configure your setup?.
data.content: Configuring a new machine is a headache. Getting all of your settings set up the exact same as you had on a previous machine can prove difficult; unless you have dotfiles in your root directory.

data.title: Smart Lighting
data.subTitle: Lighting your home like nature(ish). Your personal wireless lighting that lets you easily control your light from your device and create the right ambience for your every moments.
data.content:
Lighting that you dont notice.

Only light what you need, and use natural light colors and your eyes will thank you.
